page.title: 13ADULT TRAINING CENTRE
page.content: craft units.Assembly work is done for local firms.All trainees are taught reading,writing,language,colour and life training skills such as making tea,shopping,travelling on a bus (buying a ticket etc).None of them play musical instruments but they all love music and singing.They enjoy sports such as swimming,football,and horse riding.Last year some of them represented Durham in the swimming event for the National Olympics for the Mentally Handicapped. Pets are not allowed in the centre but most of them have pets at home. They are a very friendly happy group of people.{ {Leisure Lanchester and Burnhope have close active communities and engage in a wide variety of activities from pigeon racing to bridge clubs.
